subject: Soccer
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Amid all the preparations for the Americans’ match against the top-ranked Germans, the scouting reports from the defender Ali Kreiger may carry extra weight because she played in Germany from 2008 to 2011.
snippet: Amid all the preparations for the Americans’ match against the top-ranked Germans, the scouting reports from the defender Ali Kreiger may carry extra weight because she played in Germany from 2008 to 2011.
